Package org.modern_ehealth.util.healmac

Class HealMAC

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modern_ehealth.util.healmac.HealMAC
  • public class HealMAC
extends java.lang.Object
    Human-friendly Message Authentication Codes for Healthcare Services!

    Sometimes it's necessary to validate the authenticity of messages as part of a process that involves human interaction. In these cases it's error-prone and cumbersome to use long Message Authentication Codes generated by the more intense cryptographic hashes (512 bits?!).

    That's why Modern eHealth's open source group has created an alternative that is human-friendly enough for people to read the authentication codes over the telephone if needed.

    The HealMAC library can be used to both generate and validate codes, which generated using the modern Murmur3 hash function. For maximum readability it is recommended to encode the MAC using something like Base36 so that only familiar English alphabet letters and digits are presented to the user.

    Since:
    1.0

    • Constructor Detail

        public HealMAC()

    • Method Detail

      • generateCode

        public static byte[] generateCode​(byte[] key,
                                  byte[] message)
        Generates a Message Authentication Code (MAC) for the given message, using the given secret key. This MAC is based on the Murmur3 hash function with 128-bit output and is suitable for being read or typed by a human, provided that it is encoded with something like Base36.
        Parameters:
        key - The secret key to authenticate the MAC (recommended at least 32 bytes)
        message - The message to generate an authentication code for
        Returns:
        A message authentication code for the given message, using the given key
        Throws:
        HealMACException - if key.length == 0 or message.length == 0

      • validateCode

        public static boolean validateCode​(byte[] key,
                                   byte[] message,
                                   byte[] code)
        Validates a Message Authentication Code generated by generateCode(byte[], byte[]). The secret key provided must be the same that was used when generating the original code.
        Parameters:
        key - The secret key used when generating the MAC to validate
        message - The message to validate is authenticated by the given code
        code - The message authentication code generated with HealMAC for the given message and secret key
        Returns:
        True if the code is valid for the given message and key, false otherwise
        Throws:
        HealMACException - if key.length == 0 or message.length == 0
